comments.text: Excellent spot near the port, lots of traffic heading south. Stand after the roundabout.
Good spot but can be windy. Drivers are generally friendly.
Exit towards Agadir works well. Best in the morning.
Picked up by a local family, very hospitable!
Beautiful town, easy to get rides to Fes or Tangier. Wait at the main road junction.
Spot on the outskirts towards Meknes. Can be slow in afternoon.
Great coastal spot, easy rides along the coast.
